Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.GameModel
public class GameModel extends Object
This class manages all interactions between model and controller and handles model exceptions. It's the intended gate for the model package, all model communication shall pass through this class.

    • playAssistantCard

      public void playAssistantCard(String playerName, int cardWeight) throws GameModelException, NoSuchElementException
      Play assistant card in pianification phase
      Parameters:
      playerName - the player who is playing the card
      cardWeight - the card played
      Throws:
      GameModelException - error in model
      NoSuchElementException - there is no more cards available

    • moveStudent

      public void moveStudent(String playerName, TeacherColor color, String sourceId, String destinationId) throws GameModelException, NoSuchElementException
      The student movement of a specific color from a place to another
      Parameters:
      playerName - the player who is moving the student
      color - color of the student
      sourceId - origin of the student
      destinationId - destination of the student
      Throws:
      GameModelException - error in model
      NoSuchElementException - there is no more students

      Parameters:
      playerName - the player who is moving the student
      entranceStudent - color of the student in the entrance
      otherStudent - color of the student in destination
      destinationId - destination place

    • getStudentsInIsland

      public Map<TeacherColor,Integer> getStudentsInIsland(String islandId)
      Get for each color the number of students there are in a specific island
      Parameters:
      islandId - chosen island, if the id does not exist, it returns an error
      Returns:
      a map showing the number of students for each color in the chosen island

    • getTowerInIsland

      public Optional<TowerColor> getTowerInIsland(String islandId)
      Get the color of the tower, if any, in a specific island
      Parameters:
      islandId - chosen island, if the id does not exist, it returns an error
      Returns:
      if present, the color of the tower on the chosen island
